nr_of_particles.description: The total number of particles in the surface membrane.

initial_packing_shape.description: The initial shape for packing the cells. Allows 'spherical', 'cuboid' and 'ellipsoid'

membrane_type.description: Sets the membrane distribution. Options 'even', 'segmented'. In case of 'segmented' and two beads, generates a half sphere.

membrane_beads.description: Sets what type of membrane beads are used in the cell. Options: 'M1', 'M1, M2' etc.

junction_beads.description: Sets what type of junction beads are used in the cell (comma separated). Options: 'off', 'J1', 'J1, J2' etc

junction_bead_ratio.description: Defines the number of evenly distributed specific junction beads, set as a ratio of the total number of particles. Ignored if 'junction_beads = off'!

cell_radius.description: The radius of a single cell in nm

nearest_neighbour_springs.description: The amount of neighbours on the surface (membrane) of the cell between which harmonic bonds are defined. Accepts 'off', '1', '2' and any positive integer

number_of_cells.description: The number of cells in the system

tissue_packing.description: The packing configuration of the tissue. Allows 'hexagonal', 'monolayer

matrix_on_off.description: Set matrix on or off in simulation.

nr_of_layers.description: Sets matrix thickness, i.e. the number of layers

simulation_type.description: Sets the type of simulation, either 'cell' or 'tissue'. In case of 'cell', all tissue options are ignored in the input.JSON. This option is useful to run analysis on single cells

timestep.description: The timestep used in GMX (defined as picoseconds)

integrator.description: Sets the integrator. Allows for 'leapfrog' and 'langevin' where 'langevin' disables Tcoupl and sets ld-seed.
